resources.string:
APPNAME APPVERSION 
CPU status monitor using the charging LEDs 
Author: britoso
 
 CPUStatusLED allows users to trouble-shoot performance problems by letting the user see CPU usage over time. On a mobile device, battery power is one of the most critical resources. Unexpected heavy CPU usage could be indicative power consuming background activities.
 
 This project was initially based on the NetMeter project by Bernhard.R.Suter
 Some of the code is still used and credit for this goes to him.
 
 Project pages: 
	CPUStatusLED http://code.google.com/p/netmeterled 
	NetMeter http://code.google.com/p/android-labs 
 Forum topic (on XDA): 
	http://goo.gl/s1Qy
